properties.event summary: 09/29/2011: On Thursday, in Santiago municipality, Nuevo Leon, Mexico, a number of narco banners have appeared in the communities of El Cercado, Los Rodriguez, and San Javier over the past few days. The banners announced the possible increase of violence in the area. No group claimed responsibility for this incident.
properties.event title: Narco Banners Have Been Appearing in Nuevo Leon
properties.communication placement: The banners appeared in the communities of El Cercado, Los Rodriguez, and San Javier, in Santiago municipality, Nuevo Leon, Mexico.
properties.location: The banners have been appearing in the communities of El Cercado, Los Rodriguez, and San Javier, Santiago Municipality, Nuevo Leon, Mexico.

properties.event summary: 11/08/2011: On Tuesday, in Colonia Altavista, Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, Mexico, unidentified assailants killed a State Police officer and left a narcobanner on the windshield of his car. No group claimed responsibility.
properties.event title: Narcobanner Left on Windshield of State Police Officer's Car in Monterrey, Mexico
properties.communication placement: The place of delivery was the windshield of a state police's car in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, Mexico.
properties.location: The narcobanner was left on the windshield of the state police officer's car in Colonia Altavista, Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, Mexico.

properties.event summary: 12/12/2011: On Monday morning, narco banners were placed on bridges on the following locations in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, Mexico: Garza Sada, Revolucion, Venustiano Carranza, Fidel Velasquez, and Santa Catarina. The banners were quickly removed by the military. The content on the banners was not released. A banner was seen on Avenida Venustiano Carranza at 1115 and was removed within 30 minutes. The last banner was requesting that President Calderon detain the leaders of the Casino Royale attack. No group claimed responsibility for the banners. No casualties were reported.
properties.event title: Narco Banners Placed in Various Locations in Monterrey
properties.communication placement: The banners were placed on bridges on Garza Sada, Revolucion, Venustiano Carranza, Fidel Velasquez, and Santa Catarina, Monterrey, Nuevo Leon.
properties.location: The banners were placed on bridges on Garza Sada, Revolucion, Venustiano Carranza, Fidel Velasquez, and Santa Catarina, Monterrey, Nuevo Leon.
